metadata.Title: CVE-2020-10729 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the use of insufficiently random values in Ansible. Tworandom password lookups of the same length generate the equal value as thetemplate caching action for the same file since no re-evaluation happens.The highest threat from this vulnerability would be that all passwords areexposed at once for the file. This flaw affects Ansible Engine versionsbefore 2.9.6.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
